skills.skill: Oracle Cloud Financials / HCM Security & Controls
Full life cycle implementations including Design, Configure Test and Deploy phase
Design, Configure Test and Deploy of Business process controls, automated controls, and IT controls
Implementing out of the box HDL tool, application package migration tools
Implementation of segregation of duty frameworks and associated mitigating controls and SOD tools
Experience in implementing RMC modules including AAC, AFC, and FRC
Integrations with Identity products for enabling SSO
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Strong project management and organizational skills
Previous Consulting or Big 4 experience preferred
Understanding of Oracle Cloud configurations for the design and development of automated controls
Understanding of key business processes, the inherent risks, and potential controls
Understanding of regulatory concerns impacting Oracle Cloud environments in Government and Public Sectors
Experience in integrating with Oracle Identity Cloud Services

duties_responsibilities.duty: Delivering Oracle Cloud Applications Security & Controls implementations and Risk Management Cloud (RMC) modules.
Assessment, design, and implementation of Security and Controls.
Implementing out of the box HDL tool, application package migration tools.
Implementing RMC modules including Advanced Access Controls (AAC), Advanced Financials Controls (AFC) and Financial Reporting Controls (FRC).
Integrations with Identity products for enabling SSO.
Strong project management and organizational skills.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree required preferably in Computer Science, Information Technology, Computer Engineering, or related discipline. Master's preferred.
